title: "Teamsters, city leaders rally against self-driving trucks in San Francisco"
excerpt: "Teamsters and city leaders rallied against self-driving trucks outside San Francisco City Hall on Friday. Assembly Bill 316 would regulate autonomous trucks over 10,000 pounds and would mandate, among other requirements that someone be in the truck while it's on public roads."
